spud_being_called: Front of queue, moment of truth approaches.
Step forward, chosen one of tuber-kind.
Congratulations! Your waiting has been successful.
The Great Potato Bureaucracy summons you.
spud_in_office: Please be patient. Time is an illusion.
The queue moves in mysterious ways.
Your position has been noted by authorities.
Standing in line: the universal constant.
No spud is ready until seasoned with waiting.
Patience: not the only virtue, but listed.
warnings: Those against will be peeled with precision.
Line-jumpers transferred to Express Processing Department.
Queue disruption earns lectures about queues.
Insubordination leads to Room With Hot Oil.
We don't have to be fair, just organized.
The Committee for Spud Compliance sees all.
misc: During emergency, continue waiting in order.
Read paragraph seven of your waiting agreement?
Lost property: found, taxed, then misplaced again.
If a spud complains, does it make sound?
